name: file-presets
description: A simple extension which provides some file presets

file-presets.endingPresets.description: Use presets for file endings. Examples: .html, .ejs
file-presets.endingPresets.title: Ending Presets

file-presets.filePresets.title: File Presets
file-presets.filePresets.description: Use presets for specific files. Examples: Dockerfile, tsconfig.json

file-presets.forcePresets.title: Force presets
file-presets.forcePresets.description: If activated, presets will be accepted automatically.

file-presets.conflict.title: Conflict
file-presets.conflict.description:
Which preset to use if there's a conflict, so there's a normal and ending preset. 
Info: Other options then "Ask" will overwrite the popup asking for preset usage.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
